sense.def:
To load a vehicle or container
ali
to load things into a vehicle or container
pomeni dati stvari v vozilo ali posodo.

seg.quote: ...when they came to load the van with their things.
We started loading the pheasants into the sacks.

sense.def:
A load
je nekaj, kar nosimo.

seg.quote: We took up our heavy load and trudged back.
Its load of minerals was dumped at sea.

sense.def:
To load a gun
pomeni dati kroglo v puško.

To load a camera, computer, or tape recorder
ali
to load film or tape into a camera, computer, or tape recorder
pomeni vložiti film ali trak v fotoaparat, računalnik ali magnetofon.

Loads of something
ali
a load of something
pomeni veliko nečesa;

seg.quote: We talked about loads of things.
